thread.section_title: The Pool Centers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Pool Centers | www.thepoolcenters.com
thread.title: Mike S.
thread.title_full: The Pool Centers reviewed by Mike S.

author: Mike S.
title: Mike S.
text:
We actually have not received the cover yet but I'm sure it will be fine. The only issue was trying to order it on line. It is too difficult to describe the issues that I had here but it got to where I actually had to phone my order in.
The sales lady I spoke to was very efficient and helpful She also said they were having issues with the web site so apparently it wasn't just me.
Looking forward to the arrival of the cover tomorrow. If there are any issues there, I will be updating this review.
